storyInfo: Marcille's D32 Steel flashlight can turn the mucus of Acid Originium slugs into an edible, golden ingredient. With this, Senshi manages to satisfy the factory workers, and Laios's party obtains a free ride as payment.

attributes.content: Careful! I think we fell into a mine!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Like the worker said earlier, the slugs made a nest here!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: They colonized this place because the factory's about to shut down?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Anyone see any Goldglitter slugs?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I think these are just normal slugs.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Let's go before they notice us!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: ...Don't see any Goldglitters here either. They're all the normal kind.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: 'Bob's Gourmet Guide' says that Goldglitter Originium slugs are a common variety in the wilds. 'They live within cracks in rocks or in caves,' and 'they behave identically to other varieties of Originium slug'...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: So we should be able to find some here...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: ...Do you really not feel anything on top of your head?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Huh? Ah!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: This is an Originium slug larva! Looks like its shell has just grown in, so it's still rather soft.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: And it's busy secreting mucus to harden the shell, which raises its body temperature. It's actually quite snug and cozy having it crawl on my head like this.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Want to try, Marcille?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Absolutely not!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I have a bad feeling about going any further.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: It sounds like there's other animals in here.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: We should head back.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: We still haven't found any Goldglitters, though.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Do they really live here?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Maybe we can use something like golden powder instead for the carrots?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Let's go a little deeper. I don't want to let those lads down when they're hoping with all their heart.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: And if we don't find those slugs, we might not be able to buy that truck.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: True...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Shh, walk quieter!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: There's a group behind us, don't think they're Goldglitters though... They don't look gold, at least.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: What are they?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Acid Originium slugs!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Remember? Big Bob said their mucus is extremely corrosive! Don't get splashed by it!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Marcille!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Don't overdo it and kill them all!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: That really doesn't matter right now—
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: (Incants)—
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Ah!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Summoning magic? No, it takes too long! Defensive magic? Don't think I have enough mana...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Crap, I still can't use my staff properly here.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Oh, right. Flash magic?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I'm going to try the flashlight again!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: If the factory head was able to make it shine, then I should be able to use it to amplify my flash magic... right? But it might not be that useful against a group of monsters...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Whatever you do, do it quick! There's more of them by the second!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Fine! Here goes... Flash!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Whoa! You took them all out at once!
attributes.name: Chilchuck & Laios

attributes.content: Whoa! I did it! I think I'm starting to understand how to use the local magic!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: You're the best, Flashlight! You're the first magic item I managed to use here!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Now's not the time! Their mucus got splashed everywhere!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Be careful! Make sure it doesn't touch your skin!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Wait, the flashlight, it's...?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What's happening?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: The light coming from the tip of the D32 flashlight begins to dim, its components sparking and sizzling.
Before Marcille can even respond, thick smoke pours out of it as she drops it on the ground.
Flashlight!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Marcille! Don't zone out now! You got splashed by the mucus too!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: *sobs*... My flashlight...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I think it's broken.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Why don't we see if the factory owner can fix it once we get back?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: *sobs*...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: This mucus...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: It smells pretty good, quite unlike the mucus from last time. It's more like...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: It's... sweet and sour!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: You're right!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Ergh... You guys really need to stop putting bug mucus in your mouth.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Hmm.. Tangy. I like it!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: And what a beautiful color too! It's all bright and gold!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Gold, you say...?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: The magic shot out from the flashlight turned the mucus gold and tasty...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I think we can use this as a replacement for the Goldglitter slugs!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Hmm... The once-corrosive mucus became edible under the influence of magic... How fascinating.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: But this type of mucus is normally stored inside the slug's body. We should gather it all up and make it edible first!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Don't tell me you want to use these on the ground...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: No, ingredients must be clean. These are fine for a taste test, but absolutely not for cooking.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: And there's not enough of them to make a dish anyway.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: If we're gonna make golden carrots, we'll still have to gather the mucus inside the slugs.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: And how do we do that?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: The ones from earlier were scared off by Marcille's magic. Before they return, we gather it from the ones that're still stunned.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I'm pretty sure the flashlight is broken, though.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Why not try using your staff?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Alright... I'll try...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Did it work?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Looks like... no, the mucus hasn't changed.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Maybe give it another go?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hrgh!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: How about now?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Still no change... But why? Your magic seems to be a bit on-and-off as well, Marcille.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Yeah, it's been like this since we arrived here. The only time I was able to gather enough mana was when I managed to use the flashlight successfully.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: The factory head did say that D32 steel can withstand incredible amounts of energy.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: The flashlight might have some amplification effect? The flash magic by itself wouldn't be enough in either the mana-gathering or casting stages.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Which means, I still need...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hey, Laios, stop playing around with that slug! Are you even listening to Marcille at all?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Times like these, we just need to do what she says. This is her field of expertise, after all.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I've got it!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Got what?
attributes.name: Chilchuck & Laios

attributes.content: With just my staff and the mana I have now, I can never change the mucus into what we need.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: We'll need a conductor like the D32 steel to amplify it! There's no point doing any more tests with my staff!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: We still need that flashlight!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I think if you tried using it again while it's smoking like that, we'd just end up stunned like the slugs.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hey! When have I ever messed things up that badly?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: The only reason you guys are making progress in this discussion is because I used the flashlight to make the mucus edible!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: *Sigh* One moment, I managed to get a bit of an understanding of the local magic, and the next, my flashlight...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: It doesn't seem to have melted at all from the acid. That 'D32 steel' stuff must be this silvery metal, right?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Well, Marcille just said the material is what's important, so it should be able to discharge magic no matter the shape, right?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: What do you mean? Well, I'd assume so...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: But why are you asking that all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: ...Hmm?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Why are you looking at me like that?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Nooooo! Flashlight! My flashlight!!! Stop! Don't make it into a pot!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: The sooner we make these carrots, the sooner we find Rhodes Island, and the sooner we can save Falin, okay?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Hup!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Hah!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Look, it's not that bad. Remember that time my lockpicks were used to dig mimic meat out of its shell?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: But Flashlight is different!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: That's what I said about my lockpicks.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Pot's finished!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: No! NOOOO!!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: It's just in a new form, is all. As a tool, it's still as handy as ever.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: The form's really important, though!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: So why don't you try doing that to the mucus now?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Rest in peace, Flashlight...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: We shared such happy times together...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Don't worry. I won't let your sacrifice be in vain.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: (Incants)—
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Just a few things to go. Get these all out of here, and sell them to the scrapyard.
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: Man... I really don't want to do this...
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: We used to cook and eat here... Midnight snacks, barbecues, parties...
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: Hmm? Something smells... really good.
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: Huh... I smell it too...
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: Where's it coming from? Is someone cooking outside?
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: I'm cooking up some golden carrots for you folks.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Some... Some what?!
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: You actually managed to find some Goldglitters?
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: Nah, but we did find something else that'll turn the carrots golden.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Might not be traditional, but the color will do.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Should live up to your expectations for your last meal together.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: By the way, if you hadn't given me that flashlight, we wouldn't have been able to make this dish!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I wouldn't have been able to use my magic without it.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: It's certainly not something nobody would appreciate!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: R-Really?
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: Well?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: This taste...
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: I didn't think it'd be sweet-and-sour!
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: Amazing, right?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: It's delicious, though! It has this refreshing and fruity aroma!
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: Amazing, right?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Hmm... I bet even Big Bob never realized you could prepare acid slugs like this.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Just think about it: sodas, smoothies... There're tons of good things you can make from them!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Thanks, boss. I mean it. I never thought we'd be able to eat golden carrot on our last day here.
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: What're you thanking me for? It's them who did all the work.
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: I will say though, this doesn't taste a lick like our first meal as a crew, but...
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: Back then, when we were eating golden carrot together, you said you wanted to join me and make this Rim Billiton's number one factory!
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: Haha! Who doesn't have one or two wild dreams when they're young?
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: It's not too late, either. Just need to start from scratch, is all.
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: Right. Now that there's someone who approves of my product, maybe my dream can live on.
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: Yeah, why not take your truck around some other towns a bit, and find somewhere else to make it a reality!
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: Oh right, the truck...
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: Hey, you guys wanted to buy my truck, right?
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: What? Oh, right!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Are you alright with it?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Not that we have much money in the first place...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I'm definitely not selling it off. I still need it for my livelihood.
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: But I can take you anywhere you like, as long as it's in Rim Billiton!
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Really.
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: And for free, too!
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: Consider it my thanks for the golden carrots!
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: C'mon, eat up, then I'll take you where you need to go. As long as the engine's not kaput, we can go anywhere!
attributes.name: Factory Owner
